R = int(input())

print((int(input()) + int(input())) / 2)


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()

    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(a[n // 2 - 1])
    else:
        print(a[n // 2])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
